item.title: Teaching Proof to Future Mathematics Teachers in Mathematical Analysis Classes
item.description: arXiv:2503.14507v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: The paper examines the construction of a course in mathematical analysis at a pedagogical university, aimed at developing the ability of future mathematics teachers to detect and solve problems related to finding proofs. Key words: teaching mathematics, teacher training, discovery of proofs, quantifiers, mathematical analysis
item.dc:creator: Aslanbek Naziev, Irina Zemlyakova
